# YouTubR

The goal of YouTubR is to show data and analysis for the New York Times Youtube Channel videos.

## Installation

You can install the released version of YouTubR from [CRAN](https://github.com/Gchen0124/YouTubR/) with:

``` r
install.packages("YouTubR")
```
